add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for GET /api/v1/cart to retrieve cart contents, individual subtotals, and cart total.
add.reason: LLD does not specify the GET /api/v1/cart endpoint or its response structure, which is required for cart viewing and subtotal calculation.

add.description: Missing UI redirection logic for empty cart state ('continue shopping' link).
add.reason: LLD does not describe the behavior or workflow for empty cart UI redirection as required by the story.

add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for PUT /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to update item quantity.
add.reason: LLD does not specify the PUT endpoint for updating cart item quantity, which is required for modifying cart contents.

add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for DELETE /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to remove item from cart.
add.reason: LLD does not specify the DELETE endpoint for removing cart items, which is required for cart management.

modify.current_state: Adds item to cart after validating product availability and sets price from product.
modify.required_change: Should default quantity to 1 when adding a product if quantity is not specified.
modify.reason: Story requires default quantity of 1 for 'Add to Cart' operation, but LLD does not enforce this.

modify.current_state: Updates item quantity or removes item if quantity <= 0.
modify.required_change: Should trigger automatic recalculation of subtotal and total upon any quantity mutation.
modify.reason: Story requires recalculation of cart totals on quantity change, but LLD does not explicitly state this.
